org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: Element type "topic" must be followed by either attribute specifications, ">" or "/>".
	at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.AbstractSAXParser.parse(Unknown Source)

In plugins/org.eclipse.wst.xmleditor.doc.user_1.0.2.v200603300330.jar /XMLBuildermap_toc.xml, the XML is not valid.

line 28:
	   <topic label="Setting the XML source suggestion strategy used by content assist" href="topics/tsugstrat.html"

Please fix.
This problem was corrected in WTP 1.5. There are currently no plans to correct it in WTP 1.0.3 because although it generates an error in the log file, the help system itself functions normally.
